subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, the defending champion, beat Kei Nishikori, 6-1, 6-3, in the Swiss Indoors in his hometown, Basel, for his first title in 10 months.
snippet: Roger Federer, the defending champion, beat Kei Nishikori, 6-1, 6-3, in the Swiss Indoors in his hometown, Basel, for his first title in 10 months.
